name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Paulette A. CARRINGTON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J. and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Paulette A. CARRINGTON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgments of sentence are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Attys., Andrew B. Cohn, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
434 A.2d 715
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Paulette A. CARRINGTON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 19, 1981.
Decided Sept. 24, 1981.
Samuel Kagle, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Attys., Andrew B. Cohn, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J. and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
